full_summary:
### Provision of LCD Display Units

The National Defence acquired LCD display panels for supply.

**Background:**

National Defence aims to acquire two types of LCD display units for its facilities. The proposed procurement involves the acquisition of 2 LCD display units for CFB Halifax and 3 units for CFB Esquimalt.

**Specifications:**

*   **Item 1:**
    +   **Description:** LCD display unit with NSN 7025-20-004-4318.
    +   **Manufacturer:** MARPORT CANADA INC with NCAGE L7864.
    +   **Quantity:** 2 units with unit of issue "Each" to be delivered to CFB Halifax.
*   **Item 2:**
    +   **Description:** LCD display unit with NSN 7025-20-004-4318.
    +   **Manufacturer:** MARPORT CANADA INC with NCAGE L7864.
    +   **Quantity:** 3 units with unit of issue "Each" to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt.

**Requirements:**

Bidders are expected to submit a bid for providing equivalent or substitute products. In such cases, bidders must indicate the brand name, model and/or part number(s) of the product they propose to supply, along with the NCAGE. All bids are required to be submitted in Canadian dollars; bids in foreign currency will be rejected.

**Government Preferences:**

The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement and will accord a preference for Canadian goods and/or services when making a contracting decision.

**Documents:**

To obtain further information on this purchasing opportunity, candidates can download the Request for Proposal documents in English or French from the Canada Buys website.

### Important Links

*   [Request for Proposal in English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4938/rfp-w8482-231358%28b-en_0.pdf)
*   [Request for Proposal in French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4938/rfp-w8482-231358%28b-fr_0.pdf)

**Addendum:**

The original procurement notice has been modified by Amendment No. 001.

I am available for further assistance, including revising the addendum. Do you have any questions or need more details?   I look forward to hearing from you.
